attributes.action: Delay all bonus payments to taxpayer rescued banks until Parliament approves otherwise.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the acknowledged gross mis- management of these banks and the seriously inflated rewards system to senior employees it is necessary to consider a cap to such future payments, which includes the current ones under consideration and any such future rewards.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
